Package game

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
game.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
The GameController mainly handles the communication between the chat and the game. It reads all the game commands and distributes it to the assigned classes in the game. In particular it handles the creation of the GameBoard, joining and starting a game.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController​(ChatServer server)
      Constructor for the GameController. Assigns server and assigns the this controller to the card class.
      Parameters:
      server - server connected to the GameBoard which is responsible for the Game commands.

  • Method Details

    • readCommand

      public void readCommand​(java.lang.String message, User user)
      Reads and distributes all incoming commands regarding the game. In case the command consists of additional information in '#choose' the command gets cut. It checks if the required additional information is there and then sends only this additional information to the GameBoard to be evaluated.

      String COMMANDS: includes all game related commands that are printed out on user input '#help'. String command: saves the message and is needed to read command in case of a multiple word command.

      Parameters:
      message - String command that is received from the server
      user - user that sent the command

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Method that resets the game controlling variables when a game has ended.

    • communicateAll

      public void communicateAll​(java.lang.String message)
      Method to send in game messages to the users/players. This method sends a message to every user.
      Parameters:
      message - String that should be send

    • communicate

      public void communicate​(java.lang.String message, Player player)
      Method to send in game messages to the users/players. This method sends a message to all users except one specified player.

      ArrayList users: saves all the users currently connected to the server.

      Parameters:
      message - String that should be send
      player - Player who doesn't get send the message

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser​(User user)
      removes a user from the gamer if he stops being a player in the game
      Parameters:
      user - user who gets removed from the Game
